entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
